pages.text: 68|16|Ati sighrae ami tara surata (nakata) daga dima.
68|17|Niscaya ami ihamtaka paraiksa karaicho, yenekai paraiksa karaichilo udyana-adhipatisakalaka, yetiya sihamte sapata karaichila ye, arasye raatipuraa'i sihamte baganara phala aharana karaiba.
68|18|Arau sihamte ‘ina sba allaha’ koraa nachila.
68|19|Seye tomara pratipalakara ocarara paraa eta pradaksinakarai (biparyaya, ju'i) baganara oparata pradaksina karaile, se'i samayata sihamta achila topanita.
68|20|Phalata i (ju'i lagi) kalabarnara nicina hai ga’la.
68|21|Raatipuraa'i sihamte ijane sijanaka mati ka’le
68|22|‘yadi tomaloke phala aharana karaiba bicaraa teneha’le purati nisa'i tomalokara baganalai yoraa’.
68|23|Tara pichata sihamte yabalai dharaile, arau nimnasbarae e'i katha kai achila
68|24|ye ‘aji tata tomalokara ocarata yate kono dukhiya-abharai praraesa karaiba noraarae’.
68|25|Arau sihamte purati nisa'i drrha iccha sakti lai saksama arasthata (baganalai) yatraa karaile.
68|26|Tara pichata sihamte yetiya baganakhana dekhibalai pale, tetiya sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya patha herauraa'icho’.
68|27|‘Baram ami bancita’.
68|28|Sihamtara majara sraestha byaktijane ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka koraa nachilone ye, tomaloke kiya allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana nakaraa’
68|29|sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pratipalakara paraitrata ghosana karaom. Niscaya ami yalima achilo’.
68|30|Tara pichata sihamte ijane sijanaka dosaraopa karaibalai dharaile.
68|31|Sihamte ka’le, ‘haya, amara dhbansa! Niscaya ami simalanghanakarai achilo’.
68|32|Sambharatah amara pratipalake amaka iyatakaiyo utkrsta binimaya pradana karaiba. Arasye ami amara pratipalakara prati agrahi.
68|33|E'idarae'i haya sasti arau akhiraatara sasti arau danara, yadi sihamte janilehemtena.
68|34|Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata ache niyamatapurna jannata.
68|35|Ami muchalima (anugata)sakalaka aparaadhisakalara darae ganya karaima neki
68|36|tomalokara ki haiche, tomaloke e'ito kenekuraa sid'dhanta karaa
68|37|tomalokara ocarata kono puthi ache neki ya’ta tomaloke adhyayana karaa
68|38|ye, niscaya tomalokara babe tata enekuraa bastu ache yi tomaloke pachanda karaa
68|39|athaba tomalokara babe amara lagata kiyamata paryanta balabat thaka enekuraa kono angikara ache neki ye, tomaloke nijara babe yitorae phayacala karaiba se'itorae paba
68|40|tumi sihamtaka sodha, sihamtara majata e'i dabira jim'madara kona
68|41|athaba sihamtara babe (allahara lagata) bahuto ansidara ache neki? Ache yadi tente sihamte sihamtara ansidarasakalaka upasthita karaka—yadi sihamta satyabadi haya.
68|42|Se'idina bharaira kalaphuli unmocita karaa ha’ba, se'idina sihamtaka mata ha’ba chajadaha karaibalai, kintu sihamta saksama naha’ba
